BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature and the Governor to take steps to protect New York homeowners from catastrophic losses due to natural and manmade disasters by studying and considering measures to stabilize and strengthen our State's system of catastrophic insurance including such measures as those proposed in the New York Consumers Catastrophe Preparedness and Protection Act in which the State would partner with the insurance industry to establish a New York State Catastrophe fund.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature and the Governor to take steps to protect NY homeowners from catastrophic losses due to natural and manmade disasters.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature and the Governor to take steps to protect New York homeowners from catastrophic losses due to natural and manmade disasters by studying and considering measures to stabilize and strengthen our State's system of catastrophic insurance including such measures as those proposed in the New York Consumers Catastrophe Preparedness and Protection Act in which the State would partner with the insurance industry to establish a New York State Catastrophe fund.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYS Legislature and the Governor to take steps to protect NY homeowners from catastrophic losses due to natural and manmade disasters.
